definition: the ecliptic (the plane of the solar system)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
see 十二宮|十二宫[shi2 er4 gong1]
to enumerate what is black and yellow (idiom); to criticize sb behind his back to incite quarrels/also written 數黑論黃|数黑论黄[shu3 hei1 lun4 huang2]

sentences.english: Libra was re-defined by the Romans as a separate constellation of the Zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座被羅馬人重新定義爲黃道十二宮中單獨的一宮。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, he was looking out along the Ecliptic, in that general direction.
sentences.chinese: 但無論如何，它正在沿黃道面朝那個大致方向望出去。

sentences.english: When people speak of their "sign, " they are talking about their Zodiac sign.
sentences.chinese: 當人們提到“星座”，談論的是他們的黃道十二宮。

sentences.english: The Twelfth Sign of the Zodiac which rules the Twelfth House, the House of Everything that has gone before.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚是黃道的第十二個星座，統治第十二宮。

sentences.english: The signs of the zodiac are the constellations of stars within this band.
sentences.chinese: 黃道上的符號就是這條軌跡帶上的星座。

sentences.english: Here is a stabilizing force, one of the hardestorking signs of the Zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 是黃道12宮裏最穩定最努力工作的星座。

sentences.english: Saturn still shines in the night though, farther eastward along the ecliptic plane.
sentences.chinese: 而沿着黃道平面朝更遠的東方，土星仍在夜空中閃亮。

sentences.english: Finally, the deceased emperor was buried in the imperial mausoleum on a selected day.
sentences.chinese: 最後，皇帝會在一個黃道吉日安葬在皇陵。

sentences.english: People who belong to this sign of zodiac are ambitious with a streak of independence.
sentences.chinese: 處於這一黃道十二宮的人有野心而獨立。

sentences.english: You and the Fish are probably the two most sensitive signs of the zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 你和魚兒是黃道帶裏最敏感的2個星座。

sentences.english: An example is the point reached when the Moon is moving south and crossing the ecliptic.
sentences.chinese: 例子爲月球向南移並經過黃道平面時的那一點。

sentences.english: It represents the plane of the solar system, with the official name of "the ecliptic."
sentences.chinese: 這代表太陽系平面，學名“黃道”。

sentences.english: It will be an auspicious day for Libra men.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座男人的黃道吉日。

sentences.english: Because the lunar calendar says today is auspicious.
sentences.chinese: 因爲農曆上說今天是黃道吉日啊。

sentences.english: The Chinese zodiac operates on a rotation of 12 different signs, or animals.
sentences.chinese: 中國的黃道十二宮12生肖一輪迴。

sentences.english: In January you will become the zodiac's most favorite child!
sentences.chinese: 一月，你會成爲黃道十二宮的新寵兒。

definition: circular motion in the same sense as the sun/clockwise
see 八風穴|八风穴[ba1 feng1 xue2]
twelve divisions of the day of early Chinese and Babylonian timekeeping and astronomy
east, south, west and north/all directions
